snippet: Gilles Vaillancourt, the mayor of Laval, Quebec, for 23 years, resigned Friday, becoming the second municipal leader in the province to quit this week amid accusations of corruption.
abstract: Gilles Vaillancourt, mayor of Laval, Quebec, for 23 years, resigns, becoming the second municipal leader in province to quit amid accusations of corruption.
lead_paragraph: Gilles Vaillancourt, the mayor of Laval, Quebec, for 23 years, resigned Friday, becoming the second municipal leader in the province to quit this week amid accusations of corruption.
